alert.note: Alert for Central and Eastern Montgomery County; Northern Montgomery County Higher Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 10:28AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Montgomery County through 1115 AM CDT... At 1027 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Muddy Creek WMA to near Oden. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Mount Ida... Oden... Mauldin... Silver... Gibbs... Pencil Bluff... Sims... Story... Washita... Fannie... Hurricane Grove... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central and Eastern Montgomery County; Northern Montgomery County Higher Elevations
